ability_info.title: Plasma Field
ability_info.desc: Protects from most harmful abilities.

ability_info.title: Electro Shocker
ability_info.desc: Does shock damage to a nearby foe. Effective versus larger creatures.

ability_info.title: Disruptor Beam
ability_info.desc: Does pure damage to a nearby foe. Bonus based on its missing health.

ability_info.title: Unit Maker
ability_info.desc: Materialises a unit on the combat field that will serve and obey given orders.
ability_info.info: plasma cost = unit hexagon size + level

ability_info.title: Personal Space
ability_info.desc: Gains bonus stat points if there's an adjacent enemy unit when turn starts.

ability_info.title: Sword Slit
ability_info.desc: Swift attack on a nearby enemy unit.

ability_info.title: Pistol Shots
ability_info.desc: Delivers a ranged shot within 6 hexes. Can be used twice every single round.
ability_info.info: 20 pierce damage in any of 6 directions

ability_info.title: Rifle Assassin
ability_info.desc: Very powerful long range attack that can strike up to 12 hexagons distance.
ability_info.info: 40 pierce damage in any of 6 directions

ability_info.title: Back Stabs
ability_info.desc: Reduces some damage from behind and also harms rear melee attackers.

ability_info.title: Metallic Claws
ability_info.desc: Shreds nearby foe using its razor nails.

ability_info.title: Morning Star
ability_info.desc: Whips out its scepter like tail to bluntly punish a foe that is within 3 hexagons.

ability_info.title: Brain Storm
ability_info.desc: Damages nearby units using electricity, gaining a bonus for each collected drop.

ability_info.title: Toxic Spores
ability_info.desc: Units that come into contact have their regrowth constantly reduced bit by bit.
ability_info.info: -1 regrowth stat debuff that can stack

ability_info.title: Supper Chomp
ability_info.desc: Takes a huge bite out of nearby foe, restoring a minor amount of health.

ability_info.title: Frogger Jump
ability_info.desc: Leaps in straight line over obstacles, gaining bonus offense after landing.
ability_info.info: +25 offense for next hit if not moving

ability_info.title: Sabre Kick
ability_info.desc: Strikes a nearby foe using feet claws, doing nice versatile phyisical damage.

ability_info.title: Boiling Point
ability_info.desc: Leaves 2 puddles of hot lava under, lasting 1 round or until stepped on.

ability_info.title: Pulverizing Hit
ability_info.desc: Smacks a foe with its heavy hand, gaining bonus damage every hit.

ability_info.title: Cracked Earth
ability_info.desc: Smashes both fists into the ground, wreaking fierce havoc in area ahead.

ability_info.title: Molten Hurl
ability_info.desc: Bowls itself into first inline foe, while destroying all the traps along the way.

ability_info.title: Electrified Hair
ability_info.desc: Converts up to 1/4 of any incoming shock damage into energy points.
ability_info.info: This isn't affected by any unit stats

ability_info.title: Hasted Jab
ability_info.desc: Horn attack that gains extra damage based on the last distance traveled.

ability_info.title: Poisonous Vine
ability_info.desc: Tangles a nearby foe, causing it to take damage if it will move within next turn.

ability_info.title: Arched Pole
ability_info.desc: Damages up to 9 nearby creatures, even hitting them twice if one dies.
ability_info.info: 9 slash + 5 frost damage up to 2 hits

ability_info.title: Lamellar Body
ability_info.desc: Gains extra defense and frost mastery with every sloth unit on the battlefield.
ability_info.info: 1 defense & 1 frost for each sloth unit

ability_info.title: Flat Frons
ability_info.desc: Smashes a nearby foe using head. Knockback or deals double damage.

ability_info.title: Heavy Cloud
ability_info.desc: Summons a snow fall over any area, buffing sloth units under with frost mastery while debuffing other units.

ability_info.title: Snowman Guard
ability_info.desc: Creates a snow warrior nearby that will attack any frontal inline foe each turn.

ability_info.title: Burning Heart
ability_info.desc: Hits reduce the target's burn mastery.
ability_info.upgrade: +1 burn mastery to self on hit

ability_info.title: Fiery Touch
ability_info.desc: Scratches and burns a distant enemy. This attack has 3 hexagons extra reach.
ability_info.info: 10 slash + 10 burn damage for each hit

ability_info.title: Wild Fire
ability_info.desc: Teleports within 6 hexagons range, leaving a firewall in the old location.

ability_info.title: Greater Pyre
ability_info.desc: Meditates for a short period while causing burns to all adjacent units.

ability_info.title: Life Support
ability_info.desc: Can act one more turn after being killed.

ability_info.title: Knuckle Nib
ability_info.desc: Smashes ringed head into a foe.

ability_info.title: Meat Sickle
ability_info.desc: Drags a foe, doing bonus damage if it doesn't have any movement points.

ability_info.title: Dual Swipe
ability_info.desc: Slaps frontal units with both claws.

ability_info.title: Frigid Tower
ability_info.desc: Constantly increases offense and defense for every turn not moving.

ability_info.title: Icy Talons
ability_info.desc: Scratches nearby foe using claws, lowering frost stat with every hit.

ability_info.title: Sudden Uppercut
ability_info.desc: Sucker punches a near enemy using limb, making him delay the next turn.

ability_info.title: Icicle Spear
ability_info.desc: Launches an ice shard that can pierce up to 6 inline or diagonal distant units.

ability_info.title: Inner Vision
ability_info.desc: Lack of sight forces the creature to focus on all of its remaining senses.

ability_info.title: Tongue Poke
ability_info.desc: Hits nearby foe, crushing it if melee or pierces it if it is one hexagon distant.
ability_info.info: 20 pierce or crush damage on attack

ability_info.title: Sonic Scream
ability_info.desc: Shock waves that affect a large area but do less damage the further away.

ability_info.title: Psychic Blast
ability_info.desc: Focuses the power of mind in order to attack foes up to 4 hexagons distance.

ability_info.title: Travel Waypoint
ability_info.desc: Transfers location with any of the tiny mushshrooms that are within range.

ability_info.title: Cap Knock
ability_info.desc: Bumps its large cap into any nearby foe, damaging him and also pushing if little.

ability_info.title: Noxious Cloud
ability_info.desc: Releases several toxic clouds that can be inhaled, persisting for three rounds.

ability_info.title: Tiny Mushroom
ability_info.desc: Drops a deadly shroom that acts either as a travel point or as a poisonous trap.

ability_info.title: Bunny Hopping
ability_info.desc: Moves away one hexagon from first enemy that comes nearby frontaly.
ability_info.info: Works only once every game round.

ability_info.title: Big Pliers
ability_info.desc: Dents nearby foe using his big teeth.

ability_info.title: Blowing Wind
ability_info.desc: Pushes away any creature for several hexagons, depending on unit's size.

ability_info.title: Freezing Spit
ability_info.desc: Spits diagonal foe with cold saliva. Bonus damage based on distance.

ability_info.title: Natural Habitat
ability_info.desc: Initial spot will become a swamp home.

ability_info.title: Rabid Nip
ability_info.desc: Sink poisonous teeth into nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Bad Breath
ability_info.desc: Stinks up to three adjacent enemies, doing extra damage if they're facing.

ability_info.title: Goo Sneeze
ability_info.desc: Expels contagious toxin on distant foe, spreading to others that get too close.

ability_info.title: Gooey Body
ability_info.desc: Recovers 1/6 health at turn start for every allied creature that is nearby.
ability_info.info: This ability works when fatigued too.

ability_info.title: Gummy Mallet
ability_info.desc: Fully transforms himself into a large hammer to strike down a nearby foe.
ability_info.info: 15 crush damage for each attack done.

ability_info.title: Royal Seal
ability_info.desc: Sticks chewing gum in place to hinder any passing unit for a complete turn.
ability_info.info: Does not affect self but affects allies.

effects.special: %movement% is set to 0 for a turn

ability_info.title: Boom Box
ability_info.desc: Turns belly into a speaker, blasting a distant foe, pushing it back a notch.

ability_info.title: Explosive End
ability_info.desc: Instantly detonates when being killed, dealing damage to all adjacent units.

ability_info.title: Optic Burst
ability_info.desc: Zaps a foe with the laser cannon eye. Does more damage at closer range.

ability_info.title: Tractor Beam
ability_info.desc: Pulls a distant unit several hexagons closer, depending on its overall size.

ability_info.title: Power Charge
ability_info.desc: Causes the next ability to deal double damage or have increased efficiency.

ability_info.title: Judgement Day
ability_info.desc: Before dying, bombarding the whole battlefield after one complete round.
ability_info.info: 5 crush + 15 burn damage to all units

ability_info.title: Lava Lamp
ability_info.desc: Stares and splashes a nearby foe unit. Reduces the target's burn stat by one.

ability_info.title: Volcanic Artillery
ability_info.desc: A hot rock will hit target spot at the end of round, damaging a foe or the ground.
ability_info.info: 20 crush + 20 burn damage or a fissure

ability_info.title: Fissure Vent
ability_info.desc: Stomps one hexagon underneath, causing lava to erupt every round.
ability_info.info: 20 burn damage to all units above

ability_info.title: Spiked Fence
ability_info.desc: Foes walking on corpse get impaled and receive extra damage when hit.

ability_info.title: Trident Forehead
ability_info.desc: Pokes nearby foe with its forehead.

ability_info.title: Crocodile Clip
ability_info.desc: Bites nearby foe, crippling it for a turn, reducing up to three movement points.

ability_info.title: Circular Saw
ability_info.desc: Travels in a straight line to a new location, cutting through all units.

ability_info.title: Rib Cage
ability_info.desc: Bonus stats for every unit that dies.

ability_info.title: Dark Grasp
ability_info.desc: Strikes a nearby foe using claws, creating a Shadow Leech if it kills.

ability_info.title: Fly Swarm
ability_info.desc: Distracts a unit, lowering its defense and meditation for a complete round.

ability_info.title: Shadow Legion
ability_info.desc: Allows a long dead creature to come and fight again, as a shadow being.
ability_info.info: All shadows vanish if creature dies.

ability_info.title: Muscous Pillar
ability_info.desc: Any nearby killed units restore health based on their own total amount pool.

ability_info.title: Carving Nails
ability_info.desc: Claw swipe gesture on a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Fatal Attraction
ability_info.desc: Causes a target foe within 6 hexagons to approach her at the start of its turn.
ability_info.info: Ability does not work on summoners.

ability_info.title: Tendril Feet
ability_info.desc: All nearby foes have their movement restrained and take a bit of damage.

ability_info.title: High Voltage
ability_info.desc: Melee attackers receive damage for every hit and also lose energy points.

ability_info.title: Suction Cups
ability_info.desc: Crushes a frontal foe while draining a small amount of its maximum health.

ability_info.title: Hunting Net
ability_info.desc: Drags closer up to 3 distant units that are aligned on different parallel rows.

ability_info.title: Nitrogen Shower
ability_info.desc: Sprinkles a large frontal area with liquid nitrogen, doing cold damage.

ability_info.title: Half Full
ability_info.desc: Can regenerate health up to double. Maximum health is still the initial one.

ability_info.title: Limb Scythe
ability_info.desc: Slashes a nearby foe, causing it to hemorrhage, losing health if moving.

ability_info.title: Sangvine Puke
ability_info.desc: Target's regrowth becomes lowered if it's a foe or increased if it's an ally.

ability_info.title: Symbiotic Tumor
ability_info.desc: Engulfs body into a meat cocoon. Current turn is ended by this ability.

ability_info.title: Heat Haze
ability_info.desc: Nearby foes have their offense stat reduced, dealing way less damage.

ability_info.title: Glowing Eye
ability_info.desc: Fries a nearby foe, can target sides too.

ability_info.title: Covert Strike
ability_info.desc: Reaches any foe within 5 hexagons by digging with its tentacles, surprising it.

ability_info.title: Crashing Globe
ability_info.desc: Catapults a flaming orb at any inline spot, poking a foe or cauzing hazard.

ability_info.title: Fierce Temper
ability_info.desc: Showers lava drops at the beginning of each turn, damaging all adjacent units.

ability_info.title: Forked Fingers
ability_info.desc: Pierces foe using its harpoon fingers.
ability_info.info: 20 pierce damage per each hit done

ability_info.title: Shotgun Rampage
ability_info.desc: Blows a handful of shrapnel in a large conic area, damaging all units within.

ability_info.title: Birthing Caldera
ability_info.desc: If under 50 health, can reconfigure itself as the Lava Mollusk creature.
ability_info.info: It will have only half health & energy

ability_info.title: Healing Factor
ability_info.desc: 1/2 regrowth works even if fatigued.
ability_info.info: Applies to nearby allied units as well

ability_info.title: Iron Fist
ability_info.desc: Punches a nearby foe with it's heavy armored hand, leaving quite a mark.

ability_info.title: Bloody Greed
ability_info.desc: Powerful sword penetrating attack, affecting multiple inline hexagons.

ability_info.title: Foot Tromp
ability_info.desc: Stamps the ground, causing all units nearby to lose 90 initiative for a turn.

ability_info.title: Self Sewing
ability_info.desc: Partially repairs itself if not taking any damage at all for a whole game round.

ability_info.title: Razor Blade
ability_info.desc: Slices a nearby foe, keeping samples.
ability_info.info: 15 slash damage on every single strike

ability_info.title: Terrifying Stance
ability_info.desc: Causes a nearby foe to not be able to target Mr. Stitches directly for a turn.

ability_info.title: Voodoo Doll
ability_info.desc: Stabs itself, doing mental damage to any of the previously attacked units.

ability_info.title: Immortal Wood
ability_info.desc: Ressurects itself within three rounds if no units are sitting on top of the corpse.

ability_info.title: Stalagmite Teeth
ability_info.desc: Pierces nearby unit with its denture, striking larger targets multiple times.
ability_info.info: 10 pierce damage, can do up to 2 hits.

ability_info.title: Waterfall Cannon
ability_info.desc: Powerful jet of water that damages & pushes back, has a 4 hexagons range.
ability_info.info: 20 knocking crush damage, up to 2 hits.

ability_info.title: Thorny Weed
ability_info.desc: Nasty ivy grows at a free spot up to 6 hexagons away, waiting for a foe prey.

ability_info.title: Evolved Organs
ability_info.desc: Each new round heals himself for 25% of all the damage previously received.
ability_info.info: This ability also works when fatigued.

ability_info.title: Squid Head
ability_info.desc: Chews on a nearby enemy, stealing 5 regrowth stat points for a single turn.

ability_info.title: Tied Up
ability_info.desc: Binds together with a nearby enemy, denying it to move apart too far away.

ability_info.title: Cloned Embryo
ability_info.desc: Creates a duplicate of himself, being able to be in multiple places at once.

ability_info.title: Tankish Build
ability_info.desc: Gains 5% bonus defense every round.
ability_info.info: Double when not taking any damage

ability_info.title: Ultra Squish
ability_info.desc: Deals damage to a single nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Stone Grinder
ability_info.desc: Leaps on and destroys one or two nearby inline units that are injured.
ability_info.info: Each unit has to be under 50 health

ability_info.title: Coal Burp
ability_info.desc: Bombards an inline target with a hot coal projectile that breaks on impact.
ability_info.info: 10 crush to target + 10 burn in area

ability_info.title: Banned Touch
ability_info.desc: Every 5th melee hit taken, the attacking unit is turned to gold for a whole round.

ability_info.title: Ruby Sceptre
ability_info.desc: Pokes nearby foe using the neat staff. This attack has 1 hex extended reach.

ability_info.title: Winged Sphere
ability_info.desc: Heals an ally or damages an enemy that is at the target location after one round.
ability_info.info: 20 heal for ally or burn damage to a foe

ability_info.title: Searing Light
ability_info.desc: Conjures an energy beam that causes multiple burning hits to first unit met.
ability_info.info: 2 hits x 10 burn damage every attack

ability_info.title: Small Version
ability_info.desc: Spawns a little hungry eggplant that chases nearest foe and then attacks.
ability_info.info: Grows into an adult if it kills the target

ability_info.title: Having Dinner
ability_info.desc: Bites a nearby foe, gaining 20 bonus offense with every consecutive hit.

ability_info.title: Pony Tail
ability_info.desc: Whips and poisons all nearby units.

ability_info.title: Oral Snake
ability_info.desc: Drags a somewhat distant inline unit close while also doing damage to it.

ability_info.title: Bad Dog
ability_info.desc: Bites any frontal foe that stops by.

ability_info.title: Metal Hand
ability_info.desc: Harms a foe by using prosthetic limb.

ability_info.title: Rocket Launcher
ability_info.desc: Fires up to 3 missiles that travel a fair distance, striking individual targets.

ability_info.title: Targeting System
ability_info.desc: All rockets that didn't hit units are being redirected at any target foe.
ability_info.info: This attack counts as a single strike

ability_info.title: Cold Rain
ability_info.desc: Attackers get damaged and have their frost stat constantly reduced every hit.

ability_info.title: Organic Harpoon
ability_info.desc: Uses fingers against a nearby foe, doing more damage to it each time.

ability_info.title: Sea Serpent
ability_info.desc: Hits a nearby area using its tail, damaging one or two creatures.

ability_info.title: Tsunami Surge
ability_info.desc: Travels in a straight line to a new spot, damaging all units while ignoring traps.

ability_info.title: Battle Cry
ability_info.desc: Roars at the beginning of the turn if took any damage in previous round.

ability_info.title: Executioner Axe
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe, doing bonus damage based on its max health.

ability_info.title: Dragon Flight
ability_info.desc: Travels to a location passing over obstacles with no movement cost.
ability_info.info: +25 offense for next hit if not moving

ability_info.title: Visible Stigmata
ability_info.desc: Brings back to life the last dead unit for 3 rounds, after which it disintegrates.
ability_info.info: It will have 30% health and last energy

ability_info.title: Fearsome Unit
ability_info.desc: Nearby foes have their offense and defense reduced for a full round.

ability_info.title: Wrist Scimitar
ability_info.desc: Slashes a nearby foe using its blade, disturbing its energy regeneration.

ability_info.title: Force Display
ability_info.desc: Switches the places of two nearby side units that are the same hexagonal size.
ability_info.info: 8 crush damage to both swapped units

ability_info.title: Belt Swat
ability_info.desc: Pokes all the frontal nearby units, knocking them back one hexagon.

ability_info.title: Bronze Armor
ability_info.desc: All incoming pierce, slash and crush types of damage are greatly reduced.

ability_info.title: Brass Mace
ability_info.desc: Does versatile damage to nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Shield Smite
ability_info.desc: Pokes a nearby unit with the shield, damaging and also knocking it back.

ability_info.title: Lion Thrust
ability_info.desc: Runs fast towards an inline foe up to 10 hexagons while gaining offense bonus.
ability_info.info: +20% extra offense per hexagon ran by

ability_info.title: Pestilence Bug
ability_info.desc: All drops within 4 hexagons range are being picked at the beginning of turn.

ability_info.title: Gnarled Staff
ability_info.desc: Pokes nearby foe using wooden staff.

ability_info.title: Rock Shard
ability_info.desc: Causes an obstable to erupt at an empty location within 6 hexagons.
ability_info.info: It can be destroyed with only 2 hits

ability_info.title: Furious Twister
ability_info.desc: Summons tornado that travels inline every round, bashing first creature.

ability_info.title: Spa Clay
ability_info.desc: Gains temporary bonus regrowth and defense when staying in a mud bath.

ability_info.title: Baseball Baton
ability_info.desc: Bashes baseball bat into a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Ground Ball
ability_info.desc: Strikes a mud boulder towards a foe. Usable on one of the 3 inline rows.

ability_info.title: Mud Bath
ability_info.desc: Orders a pile of mud over any hexagon, slowing any other units that walk over.
ability_info.info: -1 movement point, on free spot or self

ability_info.title: Crystal Therapy
ability_info.desc: At turn start, heals adjacent allies and damages foes based on their number.
ability_info.info: 3 pure damage or heal per nearby unit.

ability_info.title: Shark Aggression
ability_info.desc: Bytes a nearby foe, lowering his maximum health by one each time.

ability_info.title: Crossed Bones
ability_info.desc: Continually pushes frontal inline unit, moving it up to 4 hexagons distance.

ability_info.title: Charring Flow
ability_info.desc: Ranged attack that damages first encountered units on several rows.

ability_info.title: Larva Infest
ability_info.desc: Strikes any rear foe at beginning of turn, infesting it with a big parasite.

ability_info.title: Cartilage Dagger
ability_info.desc: Hits nearby foe using frontal blade. Double damage if unit is fatigued.

ability_info.title: Whip Slash
ability_info.desc: Grasps a distant foe, pulling itself to it, doing damage based on total distance.

ability_info.title: Boomerang Tool
ability_info.desc: Forms a new weapon out of blades and throws it away 5 hexagons, returning.

ability_info.title: War Horn
ability_info.desc: Moves 3 hexes towards closest foe. Movement points are not deducted.
ability_info.info: This creature can't ever be delayed

ability_info.title: Hammer Time
ability_info.desc: Hits a nearby foe using its hard head, decreasing movement by 1 for a turn.

ability_info.title: Fishing Hook
ability_info.desc: Pierces a nearby unit while swapping places if it is small or medium sized.

ability_info.title: Tentacle Bush
ability_info.desc: Curls up in a defensive stance, reducing 25% damage from first 4 incoming hits.
ability_info.info: Becomes unmovable and skips the turn

ability_info.title: Death Dealer
ability_info.desc: Gains bonus offense stat for every kill.
ability_info.info: +10 bonus offense if last hitting a unit

ability_info.title: Trap Jaw
ability_info.desc: Bites frontal foe, doing extra damage if the target breaks away during its turn.
ability_info.info: 12 pierce damage, twice if it will move

ability_info.title: Spinal Tap
ability_info.desc: Strikes a frontal foe using back spikes, not allowing it to regenerate one turn.

ability_info.title: Skull Bolt
ability_info.desc: Uses parts from units that died within 5 hexagons radius as a deadly projectile.

ability_info.title: Bat Country
ability_info.desc: First attacker receives some damage. This ability triggers once every round.

ability_info.title: Mega Slicer
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using the claws. Target loses 20 defense for 3 rounds.

ability_info.title: Sublimal Message
ability_info.desc: Damages a 10 hexagons conic area. Lowers initiative of all affected units.

ability_info.title: Eclipsing Leap
ability_info.desc: Catapults itself over up to 3 units with very low health, squashing all of them.
ability_info.info: Targets need to sum under 100 health

ability_info.title: Hot Ashes
ability_info.desc: If killed, leaves ashes behind that will reiginite it back to life if not stomped.

ability_info.title: Little Kindle
ability_info.desc: Releases a bonfire that will chase the closest foe at a low movement speed.

ability_info.title: Blazing Waves
ability_info.desc: Launches two burning streams which will scorch all the units they encounter.

ability_info.title: Extra Motion
ability_info.desc: The lust drives it to do double effort, acting again at the end of the round.
ability_info.info: This is usable if unit wasn't delayed.
ability_info.upgrade: If killed it will die after turn.

ability_info.title: Wing Feathers
ability_info.desc: Can fly to available locations within movement range, avoiding obstacles.

ability_info.title: Slicing Pounce
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using its claws.

ability_info.title: Escort Service
ability_info.desc: Carries over a frontal or rear small or medium unit to a free inline location.

ability_info.title: Deadly Toxin
ability_info.desc: Bites a nearby enemy and poisons it. First five attacks contain more venom.

ability_info.title: Cyclic Duality
ability_info.desc: Allows the use of an attack two times.
ability_info.info: The extra usage still requires energy.

ability_info.title: Tooth Fairy
ability_info.desc: Syncs teeth into a nearby enemy.

ability_info.title: Disturbing Sound
ability_info.desc: Sings a powerful musical note inline that keeps on going when killing units.
ability_info.info: 20 sonic damage that can continue on.

ability_info.title: Chain Lightning
ability_info.desc: Releases a lightning bolt that will arch, shocking multiple adjacent creatures.
ability_info.info: 20 shock damage inline that can arch.

ability_info.title: Palm Tree
ability_info.desc: This unit usually stays underground, revealing only the tail most of the time.

ability_info.title: Crab Pincer
ability_info.desc: Powerful attack done on a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Stinger Venom
ability_info.desc: Pokes any foe within 2 hexagons range, piercing and poisoning it for two turns.

ability_info.title: Imbricated Scales
ability_info.desc: Travels through the ground to a new location, damaging all surface units.

ability_info.title: Frontal Aegis
ability_info.desc: Shield shaped head grants +9 defense bonus stat against any frontal attacks.
ability_info.info: Melee attackers are pushed a hexagon

ability_info.title: Lash Master
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using tongue, reducing its initiative for two turns.

ability_info.title: Double Slap
ability_info.desc: Strikes up to two frontal nearby units that are positioned next to each other.
ability_info.info: 20 crush damage to each unit being hit

ability_info.title: Meteor Slam
ability_info.desc: Regurgitates a sphere and throws it at any location within 8 hexagons range.

ability_info.title: Hard Headed
ability_info.desc: Frontal attacks cause way less damage.

ability_info.title: Stiff Scissors
ability_info.desc: Stabs up to two nearby diagonal units.

ability_info.title: Flying Cleaver
ability_info.desc: Jumps over a nearby creature, slicing it with its large abdominal bone hatchet.
ability_info.info: 20 slash damage to the leaped over unit

ability_info.title: Demon Hoof
ability_info.desc: Bashes nearby foe, pushing it back a couple hexagons, based on its size.
ability_info.info: 25 crush damage, up to 3 hexes push

ability_info.title: Gore Lust
ability_info.desc: Each successful hit increases both offense and burn stats by one point.

ability_info.title: Flaming Paw
ability_info.desc: Strikes an adjacent foe, doing bonus damage with each consecutive strike.
ability_info.info: 10 slash + 5 burn bonus damage on hit

ability_info.title: Bonfire Exhale
ability_info.desc: Incinerates a 6 hexagons cone area, hitting only first encountered units.

ability_info.title: Unfriendly Flare
ability_info.desc: Ranged fire attack that bounces left and right each time it hits a creature.

ability_info.title: Ethereal Shape
ability_info.desc: Passes through obstacles and only takes half of the incoming damage.

ability_info.title: Palm Jaw
ability_info.desc: Bites nearby foe by using its... hand, stealing 5 energy points from target.

ability_info.title: Sorrow Visions
ability_info.desc: Causes a foe within 5 hexagons to skip its next turn if not taking any damage.
ability_info.info: 10 mind bonus damage if the unit is hit

ability_info.title: Sleeping Mummy
ability_info.desc: Meditative state that restores 20 health if not disrupted for a round.
